mean_cn: v. 揭穿真面目，证明为假
mean_en: to show that something (such as a belief or theory) is not true :to show the falseness of (a story, idea, statement, etc.)
word_etyma: de 除去，取消，毁 + bunk床铺 → vt. 揭穿；拆穿…的假面具；暴露
short_phrase: debunk the myth about the giant white monkey
sentence: They are trying to debunk the myth of Bigfoot.
sentence_trans: 他们试图揭穿北美野人的真相。
